SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_id, image_id, document_type_id, image_status_id, scan_date, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, claim_image_id, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, is_local_repository FROM elp_claim_image WHERE claim_image_id = :claim_image_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_CLAIM_ID: SELECT CLAIM_IMAGE_ID, CLAIM_ID, IMAGE_ID, DOCUMENT_TYPE_ID, IMAGE_STATUS_ID, SCAN_DATE, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, is_local_repository FROM ELP_CLAIM_IMAGE WHERE CLAIM_ID =:CLAIM_ID
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_image SET claim_id = :claim_id, image_id = :image_id, document_type_id = :document_type_id, image_status_id = :image_status_id, scan_date =:scan_date, modified_by = :modified_by, file_name = :file_name, comments = :comments, is_local_repository = :is_local_repository WHERE claim_image_id = :claim_image_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_image ( claim_id, image_id, document_type_id, image_status_id, scan_date, created_by, claim_image_id, file_name, file_size_bytes, comments, user_name, is_local_repository ) VALUES ( :claim_id, :image_id, :document_type_id, :image_status_id, :scan_date, :created_by, :claim_image_id, :file_name, :file_size_bytes, :comments, :user_name, :is_local_repository )
